short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension add some feature to save and delete your custom filters in issues and Pull request page on Github.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feature:
- Save, Load and Delete custom filters in browser local storage
- Support Github Enterprise

Learn more about this: 
https://github.com/CoderK/github-filter-extension
